stanza.line: Beshrew that heart that makes my heart to groangroan
For that deep wound it gives my friend and meme
Ist not enough to torture me alonealone
But slave to slavery my sweet friend must bebe
Me from my self thy cruel eye hath takentaken
And my next self thou harder hast engrossedengrossed
Of him my self and thee I am forsakenforsaken
A torment thrice three-fold thus to be crossedcrossed
Prison my heart in thy steel bosom wardward
But then my friend heart let my poor heart bailbail
Whoeer keeps me let my heart be his guardguard
Thou canst not then use rigour in my gaolgaol
And yet thou wilt for I being pent in theethee
Perforce am thine and all that is in meme
